metadata.description: Collection of Claude Code plugins for Google Workspace, Twenty CRM, and Brevo integration

plugins.name: google-workspace
plugins.description: Full access to Google Workspace (Drive, Docs, Sheets, Slides, Calendar, Gmail) using curl and the Google APIs directly

plugins.name: twenty-crm
plugins.description: Full access to Twenty CRM (People, Companies, Opportunities, Tasks, Notes) using curl and the Twenty REST API directly

plugins.name: brevo
plugins.description: Full access to Brevo (email marketing, newsletters) using curl and the Brevo REST API directly
